data.name: StreamUsers
data.detailed_description:
StreamUsers is a program that allows streamers to always know who is watching their broadcast. It is enough to connect your channel in the settings and the main window will display a list of viewers, which is divided into three categories: common viewers, moderators and VIPs.

An additional category, favorite viewers, is optional. It will display viewers that you mark as favorites.

Of additional, but no less important functionality is the chat. It can be opened either in a separate window or as a browser source in a streaming program (OBS, XSplit, PlayClaw).

Main Features

  • Real-time viewer list tracking
  • Adding favorite viewers
  • Display online difference
  • Appearance customization
  • Stopwatch and timer

Chat

  • Display icons for moderators, VIPs, turbos, etc.
  • Default smileys display
  • BTTV smilies support.
  • Ability to display in the stream program: OBS, XSplit, PlayClaw

Supported streaming platform: Twitch

data.short_description: Simple and useful tool for streamer that allows you to track the current list of viewers and chat in real time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 1GHz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 1GHz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
